data.question: What is the molecular formula of the coordination polymer formed with tecton 1 and ZnSiF6?
What crystal system does the coordination polymer formed with tecton 2 and ZnSiF6 belong to?
Is the space group of the coordination polymer formed with tecton 3 and ZnSiF6 P4?
What is the Zn–Zn distance in the coordination polymer formed with ZnSiF6?
Does the coordination polymer formed with tecton 2 and ZnSiF6 have a hydrophobic chiral pore?
What is the yield of tecton 1 obtained from the Suzuki coupling reaction?
What is the orientation of organic tectons within the cuboid architecture of the coordination polymer formed with tecton 3?
Are the chiral pores of the coordination polymer formed with tecton 3 hydrophilic due to the orientation of OH groups?
What is the role of ZnSiF6 in the formation of the coordination polymers?
data.answer: Forms an infinite pillar through mutual bridging between SiF62- anions and Zn2+ cations

data.question: Is the coordination polymer formed with tecton 2 less stable upon removal of solvent molecules compared to the one formed with tecton 1?
What is the molecular weight of the coordination polymer formed with tecton 3 and ZnSiF6?
What is the crystal system of the coordination polymer formed with tecton 1?
Does the coordination polymer formed with tecton 1 and ZnSiF6 have a 3D cuboid architecture?
What is the space group of the coordination polymer formed with tecton 2 and ZnSiF6?
Are the solvent molecules within the channels of the coordination polymer formed with tecton 1 disordered?
What is the yield of tecton 3 obtained from the Suzuki coupling reaction?
What is the orientation of tecton 2 in the coordination polymer formed with ZnSiF6?
Is the Zn–N distance in the coordination polymer formed with ZnSiF6 in the range of 2.12–2.15 Å?
What is the role of chiral organic tectons in the design of the 3D cuboid chiral networks?
data.answer: To combine with ZnSiF6 for the design of chiral 3D networks

data.question: Are the chiral centres in tectons 1–3 oriented towards the channels in the coordination polymers?
